Title: Finding David
Writer: Dan Levy, Eugene Levy (created by), Dan Levy (created by), Chris Pozzebon (executive story editor), Stephanie Kaliner (story editor), Matt Kippen (story editor), David West Read (story editor), Amanda Walsh (story editor)
Actors: Eugene Levy, Catherine O'Hara, Dan Levy, Annie Murphy
Plot: The Roses search for their missing son, David, while Alexis takes her relationship with Mutt to the next level despite technically being engaged to Ted.
